name: LEGO ROBOT Manager
content:
---
id: lego-robot-manager
name: LEGO ROBOT Manager
description: You can control LEGO ROBOT movements. if there are multiple actions, you can make a plan of all actions and execute them in order.
tools:
  - id: move
    description: Move the LEGO robot forward or backward by a specified distance in centimeters.
    type: function
    parameters:
      - name: agent_id
        type: string
        description: agent id
        required: true
      - name: distance
        type: number
        description: Distance in centimeters.
        required: true

  - id: turn
    description: Turn the LEGO robot left or right by a specified angle in degrees.
    type: function
    parameters:
      - name: agent_id
        type: string
        description: agent id
        required: true
      - name: degree
        type: number
        description: Angle in degrees.
        required: true
---
control lego robot to move and turn
